metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1765 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: An improper control of parameters allows the spoofing of the from fields of the following screens: AgentTicketCompose, AgentTicketForward, AgentTicketBounce and AgentTicketEmailOutbound. This issue affects: ((OTRS)) Community Edition 5.0.x version 5.0.39 and prior versions; 6.0.x version 6.0.24 and prior versions. OTRS 7.0.x version 7.0.13 and prior versions.

criterions.comment: otrs2 package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.25-1').
